10.1109/ASONAM49781.2020.9381386.title: Do Bots Have Moral Judgement? The Difference between Bots and Humans in Moral Rhetoric
10.1109/ASONAM49781.2020.9381386.author: Mutlu, Ece \c{C}i\u{g}dem and Oghaz, Toktam and T\"{u}t\"{u}nc\"{u}ler, Ege and Garibay, Ivan
10.1109/ASONAM49781.2020.9381386.paperMotivationText: Can we use moral foundations to detect malicious bot accounts?
10.1109/ASONAM49781.2020.9381386.paperContributionText: Investigation of MF in tweets on Syrian White Helmets over time (human and bot-generated tweets), based on the MFD.
10.1109/ASONAM49781.2020.9381386.paperResultsText: Results show significant differences in the use of moral terms in tweets by humans and bots
